user_utterance: I want to book a demo!
description: Test create event on Google calendar with ambiguous time
criteria: Tmr is not a valid specified date. The bot should ask again for more details.
final_state: Setup a meeting on the google calendar at 2pm for 30 mins

expected_conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to our store. How can I assist you today?
I want to book a demo!
To book a demo, could you please provide your email address? This will help us set up the meeting for you.
Could you please provide the time when you will be available for the meeting? This will help us schedule your demo at a convenient time for you.
Could you please provide the exact date and time for the meeting? This will help us schedule your demo accurately. Thank you!

Thank you for providing the time range. To ensure we schedule the demo at a time that suits you best, would you like the meeting to start at 2:00 PM, or is there another specific time within 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM that you prefer?

Your demo has been successfully scheduled for tomorrow, February 4th, at 2:00 PM (New York time). You will receive an invitation at your email address: yl4021@columbia.edu. 

If you have any further questions or need to make changes, feel free to let me know!
